title: Easy chicken pasties
description: A great recipe for beginner cooks, young and old. Leftover chicken and crème fraîche combine to create a creamy, buttery chicken pasty.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz cooked chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces
5 thyme sprigs, leaves picked and finely chopped
small bunch fresh parsley, leaves picked and finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
